description:
Curator's Note - Of all the Reddit clients that still exist for webOS, this one is the best. You can't sign-in, so you can't vote or comment, but images, comments, and links all load -- you can even view YouTube videos if you install MeTube and URL Assist from the museum!

As of December 2023, the Reddit API lock-down is now impacting this app. There's a work-around but it may be short lived. Do the following:
1) You'll need a SSL proxy -- see the webOS Archive Docs for help there.
2)With the proxy ON, use the built-in browser on your webOS device to log in to https://old.reddit.com
3) Make sure you're running the latest version of this app -- the updater has not been added, so you'll need to manually check for update.
versionNote:
reddit: the voice of the internet -- news before it happens

Most recent changes:

- Browse galleries with slideshow support
- Save gallery pictures as your wallpaper
- Dashboard notifications for new messages and karma changes
- Easily see both articles and comments on the Touchpad frontpage
- Launch and Search through Just Type

Join one of the largest online communities, or you know, just lurk anonymously, and browse user submissions and comments that range from the mundane to the hilarious, and cover just about every topic out there. Whether you're into news, humor, photography or something more obscure, you'll probably find it (first) on reddit.

IAmA reddit allows you to register a user, login, browse topics by category, search, upvote and downvote user comments, reply to comments and more.

More features are planned!

Revisionist History Note: Updated in 2023 to support opening articles in the Browser using old.reddit.com
